titleStmt.title: The present correction and reproof of sin or A discourse on 2 Jer. 19. vers. Thine own iniquities shall correct thee, & thy backslideings shall reprove thee.
titleStmt.author: Shower, John, 1657-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Eaglesfield, at the Marigold, near Sarisburry-court in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Marigold, near Sarisburry-court in Fleetstreet
